Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"

::Dollen::

        Dollen grumbled.  He looked at Reptilica, and then at S=
tarscream, and then at Phobia.  When he looked at Phobia he sneered.  Then =
he looked up at GoldenEye, flying off.  He was going insane!!!  He couldn't=
 take it anymore!!  Suddenly, his mind was blinded, by images of the beauti=
ful bot he thought he was over.  He held his head in his hands, and fell do=
wn on his knees.

     "Uggghh, who are you!!!!!!  What do you want!!!!!!  =
I don't like you, stop this!!" He mumbled.

      He kept repeating to hims=
elf, "I don't like you, I don't like you, I don't like you......" He kept s=
aying to himself, his voice drifting off into the air.  Then he suddenly sa=
w, in his mind, all of the Predacons.  He was looking up at them.  They wer=
e laughing at him, laughing hysterically.  Then he saw GoldenEye, making ou=
t with another bot.  Suddenly, all the bots there started saying, "Reject!!=
  A Reject!  A Reject!!  Nothing but a reject!!!"

     "Nooooo, noooo!!!!!=
  Go away!!!!  It's not true!!  NOOOOO!!!!," Then, his mind snapped back to=
 where he was, what was going on.

     "I can't take this anymore!!!!!  I'=
m sorry, fellow team mates, I have to get away.  I can't do this anymore!! =
 I need some time to cool off, when you see GoldenEye again, tell her I am =
gone, but I still want to be there for her," And with that, he turned, and =
walked away, into the shadows, and he couldn't be seen anymore.  Unfortunat=
ely for him, he still had Phobia's baby implanted on him.
